name: presentation
description: Presentation for RAiD Aug 25 Engineering Meetup. Requires python to run

scripts.slides: concurrently -k -n static,mkslides -c green,cyan "npm run serve-static" "npm run serve-slides"
scripts.restart-db: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && wait-on -d 1000 tcp:5432
scripts.start-3: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma && ts-node src/print-schema.ts && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.sample-3: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma && ts-node src/print-schema.ts && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.start-4: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/4_indexing/schema.prisma && ts-node src/benchmarking/index.ts  && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/4_indexing/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.sample-4: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/4_indexing/schema.prisma && ts-node src/benchmarking/index.ts "../exercises/sample-solutions/4_indexing/createIndexes.sql"
